news_header: Metsä Fibre initiates arbitration against Valmet Technologies over financial claims.
news_text: Metsä Fibre, a subsidiary of Metsä Group, has initiated arbitration against Valmet Technologies regarding claims related to its bioproduct manufacturing facility in Kemi. Valmet has stated that Metsä Fibre's claims are unfounded, with an initial amount of EUR 47 million mentioned. Additionally, Metsä Fibre is seeking to hold Valmet accountable for potential liabilities estimated at around EUR 65 million.
